attributes.action: inform Blackburn with Darwen Council that the people of Blackburn, Lancashire want their local festival 'Arts in the Park' to replace the unpopular 'Celebrate Blackburn' event which over took  in 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2008, Blackburn's popular local arts festival was axed in favour of a sub-standard event which has not been popular with it's residents. We, the undersigned, would also like to join the 'Arts in the Park' festival with 'Mela', another local festival aimed at the ethnic minorities living within the area which was axed. We believe this will help break down social barriers and stop the segregation which is happening in our town between it's people.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
